detail_desc: Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
T-shirt in jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck and straight-cut hem.
Fully lined bikini top with a decorative tie detail at the front and underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back. Medium lift.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey with a low neckline and decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Knee-length jersey dress with a round neckline with an opening and button at the top, and decorative pleats at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Top in ribbed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and wide ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a button placket and a braided, detachable belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy, patterned chiffon weave with a decorative frill around the neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in jersey.
Calf-length, fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend. Long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs, a ribbed trim around the neckline, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and decorative straps at the back. Lined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pre-tied bow ties in woven fabric with an elastic strap at the back of the neck with an adjustable plastic fastener. Width 8 cm.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Imitation leather iPhone case with four card slots in the flap. Closes with a tab and press-stud. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Bell-shaped skirt in imitation leather with a visible zip at the back and a raw-edge hem. Jersey lining.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and legs that finish just below the knee with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Top in soft, lustrous jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a gently draped neckline.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Bucket hat in fluffy pile with a shiny satin lining. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a wrapover front with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist that has ties at the front and elastication at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with hole-knit sections. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

H&M LOVES WWF. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs at the back of the neck, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Pencil case in shimmering imitation leather with a zip at the top. Unlined. Size 5x6x20 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist with grosgrain ties that can be tied into a bow at the front, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets.
Fitted jumper in a soft, airy, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Boxy-style jumper in a fine knit with a soft, brushed finish. Low dropped shoulders and long dolman sleeves.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs that taper to the hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Tear-shaped metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass beads. Length 8 cm.

Fitted body in soft, patterned ribbed jersey with a deep neckline at the front and decorative ties at the top. Short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and concealed fasteners at the crotch.

Long-sleeved nursing dress in a soft, fine knit with a brushed finish. Wide neckline and double-layered top at the front for easier nursing access, and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist.
Chunky-sole trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles.
Trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Front and back pockets and slim legs with a  decorative zip at the top and decorative seams.
Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders with a flounced trim and long sleeves. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, concealed zip at the back and gently flared hem with a slit at the front. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Soft, padded, ankle-high slippers in pile with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors. Pile lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Short dress in a sturdy weave with a sheen. Deep V-neck and a concealed zip at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams, a seam at the waist with a wide pleat and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with frills down the front and a V-neck with ties at the neckline. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Dress in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.
Chinos in a stretch cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. Decorative coin pocket, diagonal side pockets and fake jetted back pockets.
Belt in imitation leather with a heart-shaped metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Short, fitted sports top with a racer back and elasticated hem. The sports top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Oversized tunic in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with ties. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and wide flounces at the hem.
Cardigan in soft, rib-knit cotton containing glittery threads with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey.
Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Trousers in a stretch weave with elastication at the back and wide jersey ribbing at the front for best fit. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a lace collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in viscose jersey with cap sleeves and a lace yoke at the front.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

prod_name: S. Skinny HW Ankle Star Consc
detail_desc: 5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Empire-line dress in mesh embroidered with dangling sequins (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Short, flutter sleeves and an opening with a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Satin lining.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery, shell-shaped appliqués on top and curly hair extensions at the sides.
